Text.Language: Twbh m~Po#c# e~h~r/i e~jwn: w~ piaylovoroc m~marturoc: Yeo~dwroc pic~tratilat/c: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray to the Lord on our behalf, O struggle mantled martyr, Theodore the general, that He may forgive us our sins.
